55.eng-name: The Book of Zuhd and Softening of Hearts

hadiths.text: The son of Abu Said al-Khudri reported on the authority of his father that Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said:When one of you yawns, he should try to restrain it with cue help of his hand since it is the Satan that enters therein

chapter.eng-name: Saying: "May Allah Have Mercy On You" To One Who Sneezes, And Yawning Is Disliked
